text:
The use of interferon alpha-C in patients with metastatic renal cell carcinoma arising in a congenital solitary kidney.
 Three cases of renal cell carcinoma in a congenital solitary kidney are presented.
 Treatment with recombinant interferon alpha-C was administered in two cases.
 A subjective response occurred in one case.
 The literature is reviewed with respect to treatment options and prognostic factors.
